div.p: This value set expansion contains 4 concepts.

td.a: The primary DTP series has been completed and client is currently pregnant-132

tr.td: The primary DTP series has been completed and client is currently pregnant

td.a: First tetanus and diphtheria booster dose was administered-140

tr.td: First tetanus and diphtheria booster dose was administered

td.a: Second tetanus and diphtheria booster dose was administered-140

tr.td: Second tetanus and diphtheria booster dose was administered

td.a: Third tetanus and diphtheria-containing booster dose was administered. Tetanus and diphtheria immunization schedule has been completed-260

tr.td: Third tetanus and diphtheria-containing booster dose was administered. Tetanus and diphtheria immunization schedule has been completed

description.value: ValueSet IMMZD18SDTPPregnancyStartingWith3Doses for IMMZ.D18.S.DTP.Pregnancy starting with 3 doses schedule. Business rule: Determine if the client is due for a diphtheria–tetanus–pertussis (DTP) vaccination according to the national immunization schedule Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any Table: Diphtheria and tetanus vaccination schedule in pregnant women who received 3 childhood diphtheria–tetanus–pertussis (DTP) doses

code.value: The primary DTP series has been completed and client is currently pregnant-132

display.value: The primary DTP series has been completed and client is currently pregnant

display.value: First tetanus and diphtheria booster dose was administered

code.value: Second tetanus and diphtheria booster dose was administered-140

display.value: Second tetanus and diphtheria booster dose was administered

code.value: Third tetanus and diphtheria-containing booster dose was administered. Tetanus and diphtheria immunization schedule has been completed-260

display.value: Third tetanus and diphtheria-containing booster dose was administered. Tetanus and diphtheria immunization schedule has been completed
